text: Valeriy Pavlovych Pustovoitenko (born 23 February 1947) is a Ukrainian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Ukraine from 1997 to 1999. He was a leader of the People's Democratic Party of Ukraine. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Ukraine Category:Mykolaiv Oblast
title: Valeriy Pustovoitenko
